Frequently Asked Questions

Is Raffle Studio free to download? +

Yes! Raffle Studio is free to download and use.

What devices are supported? +

Raffle Studio is available for Android devices. You'll need Android 8.0 or later to run the app.

How do I print my raffle tickets? +

After designing your tickets in the app, you can print them directly to any AirPrint-compatible printer or save them as PDF for printing later. The app includes print preview and formatting options to ensure perfect results.

Can I customize the ticket design? +

Absolutely! Raffle Studio offers can create your own design from scratch. You can add your organization's logo, change colors, and include custom text and numbering.

How many tickets can I print at once? +

You can print up to 100 tickets at once. The content of the tickets can influence the number of tickets you can print.

How many designs can I create? +

You can create an unlimited number of designs. But keep in mind that you can save only 10 designs at once.

Still have questions? Our support team is here to help!

Contact Support
